Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type

package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type
This package contains types (e.g., Boolean, integer) and expressions operating over them (e.g., Boolean connectives, arithmetic operations), grouped into subpackages. Constructors of the types and expressions are usually package private. Use the factory classes instead.

- Expr is the main interface for expressions.

- hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.anytype and hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.abstracttype are expressions for multiple types (e.g., conditional). - hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.booltype contains the Boolean type and expressions (e.g., and, or). - hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.bvtype contains the (SMT) bitvector type and expressions (e.g., bitwise and, shifts). - hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.inttype contains the mathematical (SMT) integer type and expressions (e.g., add, multiply). - hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.rattype contains the rational type and expression (e.g., division). - hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.arraytype contains the SMT array type (associative mapping from a key type to a value type) and expressions (e.g., read, write). - hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.functype contains the function type and expressions.
